descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
🏆 Best VR Game nominee, Golden Joystick Awards 2023
🏆 VR Game of the Year 2023, Digital Foundry
🏆 Best VR Game, Best Gameplay, Accessibility Award nominee, Debug Awards 2023

SEGA’s futuristic sports classic is reimagined for VR!
C-Smash VRS fuses low-gravity racket action with block-breaking challenges and incredible style in a cosmic setting.

# A Revolutionary VR Experience Created By Veterans
Imagine feeling stimulated and relaxed, your mind and full-body avatar at one with the best music and visuals. A transportive experience is delivered to you by a dream team of VR pioneers to top artists, graphic designers, and musicians committed to changing how a game can make you move, see, hear, and feel.

[media]

# Challenge Other Players To The Rhythm Of Music
Journey to the edge of space and time or play a variety of competitive modes against players online. Build up a sweat in the Infinity mode, alone or with a friend. 
Become one with dynamic music, living environments, and ultra fluid gameplay - everything and everyone pulsing to the beat. Original tracks from DJ Ken Ishii (Rez Infinite), Danalogue (The Comet is Coming), and UNKLE achieve pure synesthesia during your game sessions!

[media]

# A Physical Game For Everyone - Designed To Take The Work Out of the Workout
Intuitive controls allow you to learn the basics in minutes before mastering Power Smashes and other special techniques. Innovative Accessibility options make this a game for everyone: standing, seated, one- or two-, left or right-handed.

[media]
